name: LASTLIGHT-ZERO
description:
This is my first game, I completed it in 7 days. It is like beta version of he actual game.

    Light and darkness warriors are fighting an unending war. The king of darkness had captured all the light warriors. They are now imprisoned in many high security prisons. Your character ray is very small. So the king put  him in dinade prison. You are the only chance of light to win against darkness. You must free yourself and others. Many challenges are waiting for you in the future.
